title: Trim utility for Windows XP, Vista and Windows 7
description:
Trim utility for Windows XP, Vista and Windows 7 created by Patriot Memory.



A. The utility works in Windows XP, VistaÃ‚Â® and Windows 7 only.

B. The utility should not wipe out any data however it is highly recommended
   to back up data on the drive to before running the application.

C. The application should be ran in the same drive as the host O.S.

D. The application will only apply for each partition created and not the whole
   drive.
   For example; if you have a 128GB hard drive with two 60GB partitions,
   you would need to run the application foreach partition
